title: Joules to Calories Converter (J ⇄ cal ⇄ kcal)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: J → cal: \( \text{cal} = \dfrac{\text{J}}{4.184} \) J → kcal: \( \text{kcal} = \dfrac{\text{J}}{4184} \) cal → J: \( \text{J} = \text{cal} \times 4.184 \) kcal → J: \( \text{J} = \text{kcal} \times 4184 \) kJ → J: \( \text{J} = \text{kJ} \times 1000 \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).

Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
